info:
Description

Toolset manager which allows collaborating and sharing nuke toolsets among artists. You can add and insert toolsets

Usage

To add a toolset just select the desired nodes and choose 'add toolset...' from the ToolEngine's menubar. To insert a toolset simply navigate to ToolEngine-> choose category -> choose a toolset. For example ToolEngine->3D->3DScene (if there is such a category and such a toolset in your environment.)
